attributes.action: Extend the Cancer Drugs Fund past 2016
attributes.additional_details:
To extend the Cancer Drugs Fund past 2016 to help myself who has Advanced Breast Cancer and all of us facing Cancer treatment now or in the future that may not yet be available on the NHS because of NICE guidelines. Funding should be available to us all.
Please help and sign this petition.  It may one day help you, a friend or family member.
